## Tile.invalidateResourceInfo() method

Force invalidation of the cached \[\[TileResourceInfo\]\]. Useful after the `Tile` has been modified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
invalidateResourceInfo(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
